data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Abies magnifica (California red fir) from sample ASHL-42

Exposition E, Slope 10 deg, Geology: Granit Hangschutt, Tree line 2050 m, av. Tree height 30 m, Tree cover 30%, Shrub cover 2%, Herb cover 90%, Vegatation type: Restbest. ehem. ABMA-Plenterwaldes. Homog. , Film number: 682A
